casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Quentin Odell MATHIS No. 354P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Mathis, Quentin Odell. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill. Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of October 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
